title: Fort Sumter National Monument: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Information        No Elevator Service at Fort Sumter  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, No Elevator Service at Fort Sumter  The museum, restrooms, bookstore, and top level of Fort Sumter are only accessible by climbing stairs. For more information, visit the link below or please call (843) 883-3123. more
